data.title: MOT Charter School: Home of the Mustangs
data.meta_description: Tuition-free, public charter school serving students in grades K-12. Our school community works together to support each child in achieving academic excellence, building character and becoming their best self. We are consistently ranked in the top 10 of charter schools in Delaware.
data.text: Just over twenty years ago, a group of parents, educators and community members came together to bring life to an idea. Their goal was to create a school that would provide the families of Middletown, Odessa, and Townsend (MOT) the education their children deserved - to build a community of educators who would meet their children where they were, who would inspire and encourage them, who would challenge and motivate them to grow and develop in ways they had not previously imagined...
